node.html:
• Built and maintained scalable web applications using C#, Blazor, MVC and .NET, delivering high-performance solutions aligned with modern software architecture principles.
  • Optimized SQL databases by designing efficient queries and stored procedures, reducing query execution time by 25% and improving overall data processing speed.
  • Streamlined deployment processes by developing and managing CI/CD pipelines, automating testing and ensuring seamless software releases.
  • Created and executed unit tests that improved code quality, resulting in a 15% reduction in production issues and enhancing software stability.
  • Collaborated within Agile teams, contributing to sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives to meet critical project deadlines.
  • Utilized Git version control to maintain efficient code management, enabling smooth collaboration and integration across development teams.
  • Ensured compliance with the SDLC, focusing on continuous improvement in software design, testing, and deployment workflows.
  • Leading and mentoring a team of developers by delegating tasks, facilitating Agile sprint planning, reviewing pull requests, and providing technical guidance to ensure consistent delivery of high-quality solutions.

• Played a pivotal role in Customer Satisfaction and Support (CSAT), ensuring seamless assistance post-deployment.
  • Leveraged technologies like Postman API, Docker Commands, Kibana, Strom UI, Kafka, and Azure Portal to facilitate customer support and satisfaction.
  • Conducted in-depth analysis of user needs and workflows, crafting intuitive interfaces for enhanced usability.
  • Identified and rectified software design flaws during both development phases and post-installation to ensure optimal performance.
  • Spearheaded software system testing and validation procedures, overseeing programming tasks and documentation for quality assurance.
  • Developed moderately complex code aligned with precise business requirements and user stories.

• Developed websites utilizing PHP, ASP.NET, Node.js, Express, Laravel, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular.js languages.
  • Implemented web solutions employing Visual Studio and ASP.NET MVC layouts to ensure efficient functionality.
  • Created visually appealing, user-friendly designs and streamlined code, improving website performance and increasing user engagement by 15% through optimized UI/UX design principles.
  • Engineered highly responsive, scalable web applications tailored to various industries and client specifications.
  • Conducted thorough testing and validation protocols, improving application functionality and performance with a 20% reduction in bugs during the QA phase.
  • Managed both new development and updates across multiple programming languages.
  • Oversaw the complete lifecycle of applications, from initial design to debugging and full-scale production.
  • Addressed client feedback, swiftly identifying and resolving issues, resulting in increased customer satisfaction and a 15% boost in repeat business.
  • Contributed to Quality Analysis of the system by performing debugging, end-to-end manual testing and unit testing cases using Jest.
  • Specialized in building SaaS e-commerce websites, booking systems, and product-based applications, leading to enhanced customer engagement and streamlined order processing for clients.
  • Proficient in developing RESTful APIs, resolving complex problems and enhancing application performance, contributing to a 15% improvement in API efficiency and responsiveness.
  • Worked closely with developers, project managers, UI/UX team and testers (QA) to meet client requirements.

• Developed and contributed to a sports management project, 'SuratCricUps,' focusing on cricket.
  • Conducted rigorous cross-browser and device testing to ensure optimal performance and user experience.
  • Demonstrated proficiency in writing efficient, maintainable code to enhance project functionality.
